# Home & Verse - llms.txt
# https://homeandverse.co.uk

> Home & Verse is a UK-based luxury European homeware retailer, the consumer brand of DM Brands Ltd.

## About
Home & Verse curates beautiful homeware from Europe's finest design houses. We are the official UK distributor for Räder, Remember, My Flame, Relaxound, Ideas4Seasons, and Elvang Denmark.

## Brands We Carry
- **Räder** (Germany): Poetic porcelain, atmospheric lighting, iconic light houses since 1990
- **Remember** (Germany): Bold, colourful homeware celebrating pattern and playful sophistication  
- **My Flame** (Netherlands): Hand-poured soy candles with hidden messages
- **Relaxound** (Germany): Original Zwitscherbox birdsong boxes and nature soundboxes
- **Ideas4Seasons** (Netherlands): Seasonal decorations and festive homeware
- **Elvang Denmark**: Luxurious throws, cushions & scarves in premium alpaca wool

## Product Categories
- Christmas decorations and gifts
- Candles & home fragrance
- Lighting and light houses
- Tableware and dining
- Home décor and ornaments
- Gifts for all occasions

## Shipping & Returns
- Free UK delivery on orders over £30
- International shipping to EU, USA, Canada
- 30-day returns policy
- Same day dispatch before 2pm

## Contact
- Email: hello@homeandverse.co.uk
- Phone: +44 1905 616006
- Trade enquiries: sales@dmbrands.co.uk

## Technical
This is a React single-page application with server-side product data. Product information is loaded dynamically via API. For the most accurate product data, please refer to the live website.
